mapper.select: select concat(substring(hd.dealYear, 3), '.',lpad(hd.dealMonth, 2, '0'), '.', lpad(hd.dealDay, 2, '0')) as dealDate, hd.dealAmount, hd.area, round(area * 0.3025, 2) as parea, hd.floor from houseinfo hi join dongcode dc on hi.dongCode = dc.dongcode join housedeal hd on hi.aptCode = hd.aptCode where hi.aptCode = #{aptCode};
